Suukie walked up to Iron Raptor and resumed his evil stare......he directed
it towards Iron Raptor because Plintissa was unfindable.......suddenly,
Plintissa came in, and Suukie stared at them both... "why are you staring
like that?...." Plintissa asked...no response..... "speak up or i'll have to
slag you again!..." Plintissa screamed...... "i am staring because i am
Unicron! god of the universe and a good Christmas tree!...." he said...he
started to shoot himself with his own gun.....he stopped and resumed his
stare at Iron Raptor.......
----- Original Message -----
From: "Iron Raptor" <ironraptor13@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 10, 2000 8:19 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ( Yes! It's good to be back in the swing of things! Oh, and Yanshosh...it
was very kind of you to put IR in a CR chamber while my Hot Mail problem was
going on.
> Thanx!)
>
> * Zyber sniffed the wind and still followed the sent of some strange
being.*
> ( I'm still a little off track, I'm not sure if Striker's still out there.
Sorry if I'm wrong.)
>
> _______________________________________________
>
> * Iron Raptor sighed and opened her optics a little, what had happened?
She noted that she was in a CR chamber but that was about all that made
sense, she snarled as she felt the pain in her neck and chest. She knew that
the healing process was not yet complete.
> Iron Raptor sighed and gasped, she said through clenched teeth.*
>
> " Computer, how did I get here?"
>
> * With a slightly muffled tome the computer responded.*
>
> COMP: "Subject Prowl has brought primary subject to CR chambers."
>
> * Iron Raptor closed her optics as a tired and warn sleep began to
overtake her, another favor that she owed her Maximal friend. But as she was
injured she made a personal note to check on everybot when she had
recovered, even though she was no longer in command she still cared about
the wellbeing of the Maximal troops.
> Besides, if it wasn't for them the Alliance would have total control over
the Ark as well as the Preds. Even though they had lost the base was still
theirs! So in truth, did they truly loose?
> Iron Raptor quickly slipped into a dreamless sleep but was thankful that
Prowl had saved her life.*
>
> ( OK, Someone wanted me to say the damage that the Ark got...well here it
is:
> Structural damage to the roof and main side, a few more gashes and holes
to the left side of the ship. A few systems such as...uh...secondary
scanners and autoguns 1 through 3 have been knocked off line. I think that
that's about fair. Besides, the Maximals will have their hands full with
just the first two.
> Well, there it is.)
>
>
